title: Ticket #4610: Unify local address desirability
description: We need to identify how desirable/useful a given local address in so that we can select the "best" one. Currently that code is in /src/condor_utils/my_hostname.cpp around line 168 in network_interface_to_ip and /srtc/condor_utils/ipv6_hostname.cpp around line 152 in init_local_hostname (or init_local_hostname_impl). In both cases look for "desireability" or "desirability". This should be unified into a single function, probably part of condor_sockaddr, that just returns an integer rank.
